func:
var chatbot     = msg.chatbot_response ,
    userObj     = msg.userObj ,
    req_body    = msg.req_body;

msg.payload = {
  "table": "details",
  "task_id": [msg.addedUserTaskId], //under masterbot user sub_category task_id
  "child_task_id": null,
  "user_id": null,
  "from_user_id": {
      user_id: userObj._id,
      phone: userObj.virtual_phone,
      firstname: userObj.firstname,
      lastname : userObj.lastname,
      type     : userObj.type,
    },
  "page_id": msg.added_user_page_id, // masterbot user_sub category page_id
  "from_page_id": 5,
  "to_page_id": 0,
  "synchronized": 0,
  "processed": 0,
  "status": 0,
  "read": 0,
  "display_if_empty": "true",
  "date_created": "",
  "offline_expiration_seconds": 0,
  "priority": 1,
  "type": {
      "public": "public",
      "dri_main": "dri_main"
    },
  "image": "",
  "from_user": {},
  "user_incoming": {
    "note":  (userObj.firstname + userObj.lastname) || req_body.body ,
    "message": req_body.body
  },
  "watson_incoming": {
    "message": chatbot.data,
    "response": chatbot
  },
  "template": {},
  "timeout": {},
  "user_calculate": {},
  "location": {},
  "default": {},
  "count_status": {},
  "count": {},
  "count_if": {},
  "createdAt": new Date().getTime()
};

msg.userDetailPayload = {
  "table": "details",
  "task_id": ["18_0"],  //on user chabot sub-category 
  "child_task_id": null,
  "user_id": null,
  "from_user_id": {
      user_id: userObj._id,
      phone: userObj.virtual_phone,
      firstname: userObj.firstname,
      lastname : userObj.lastname,
      type     : userObj.type,
    },
  "page_id": 18, //on user chabot sub-category page_id 
  "from_page_id": 5,
  "to_page_id": 0,
  "synchronized": 0,
  "processed": 0,
  "status": 0,
  "read": 0,
  "display_if_empty": "true",
  "date_created": "",
  "offline_expiration_seconds": 0,
  "priority": 1,
  "type": {
      "public": "public",
      "dri_main": "dri_main"
    },
  "image": "",
  "from_user": {},
  "user_incoming": {
    "note": req_body.body,
    "message": req_body.body
  },
  "watson_incoming": {
    "message": chatbot.data,
    "response": chatbot
  },
  "template": {},
  "timeout": {},
  "user_calculate": {},
  "location": {},
  "default": {},
  "count_status": {},
  "count": {},
  "count_if": {},
  "createdAt": new Date().getTime()
};

node.warn(msg);
return msg;
